actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to guarantee or insure loans under such Act in the full amount provided by law.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to guarantee or insure authorized loans under such Act in the full amount provided by law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to guarantee or insure loans under such Act in the full amount provided by law.
